name: Vanilla Vegan Frosting
description: Learn how to make the best Vanilla Vegan Frosting with only 4 ingredients! Use it to top your favorite cake or cupcake recipe. No one will guess it's dairy free!
recipeIngredient: 1 cup earth balance vegan butter, softened to room temperature

recipeInstructions.text: Beat the vegan butter with an electric mixer until creamy.
recipeInstructions.name: Beat the vegan butter with an electric mixer until creamy.

recipeInstructions.text: Gradually add the powdered sugar, about 1/2 cup at a time, until all the powdered sugar is mixed in.
recipeInstructions.name: Gradually add the powdered sugar, about 1/2 cup at a time, until all the powdered sugar is mixed in.

recipeInstructions.text: With the mixer on low-medium speed, add the non-dairy milk, 1 tablespoon at a time. Add the vanilla as well, and increase the speed to high. Beat for about 30 seconds, until light and fluffy.
recipeInstructions.name: With the mixer on low-medium speed, add the non-dairy milk, 1 tablespoon at a time. Add the vanilla as well, and increase the speed to high. Beat for about 30 seconds, until light and fluffy.

recipeInstructions.text: If the frosting seems too thick, you can add more non-dairy milk, 1 tablespoon at a time. If the frosting is too thin and runny, simply add more powdered sugar, 1/2 cup at a time until the desired consistency is reached.
recipeInstructions.name: If the frosting seems too thick, you can add more non-dairy milk, 1 tablespoon at a time. If the frosting is too thin and runny, simply add more powdered sugar, 1/2 cup at a time until the desired consistency is reached.

recipeInstructions.text: Use it to frost Funfetti Cupcakes, Chocolate Cake (or cupcakes) or Vegan Vanilla Cake.
recipeInstructions.name: Use it to frost Funfetti Cupcakes, Chocolate Cake (or cupcakes) or Vegan Vanilla Cake.

recipeInstructions.text: You can store the frosting in the refrigerator for 1-2 weeks. It will firm up when it's cold, so let it soften at room temperature a bit before frosting a cake or cupcakes with it.
recipeInstructions.name: You can store the frosting in the refrigerator for 1-2 weeks. It will firm up when it's cold, so let it soften at room temperature a bit before frosting a cake or cupcakes with it.

keywords: vanilla frosting, vegan cake, vegan cupcakes, vegan frosting
